106afb6647032200b4fad7527c9a71e7admin2024-12-11 19:54:482e8a94e3839612105203c170deaad31031globaladmin2024-12-12 16:51:04sys_hub_step_instance2e8a94e3839612105203c170deaad310600sys_variable_valueadmin2024-12-11 19:54:497e8a94e3839612105203c170deaad32f25admin2024-12-12 15:57:38(function execute(inputs, outputs) { outputs.cells = []; outputs.found = 0; outputs.error = false; outputs.error_message = ""; var regex = new RegExp(inputs.value, inputs.regex_flags); try { var parser = new sn_impex.GlideExcelParser(); var attachment = new GlideSysAttachment(); // use the attachment sys_id of an Excel file var attachmentStream = attachment.getContentStream(inputs.file_sys_id); // set the source to be parsed parser.setSource(attachmentStream); for (var sheet in inputs.sheets) { // set the worksheet name to be parsed parser.setSheetName(inputs.sheets[sheet]); // parse the worksheet if (parser.parse()) { // get the columns var columns = parser.getColumnHeaders(); // iterate over each row var row_index = 1; while (parser.next()) { row = parser.getRow(); // interate over each column in the row for (var column in columns) { cell = row[columns[column]]; if((inputs.regex && regex.test(cell) || cell == inputs.value)) { var json = {}; json.sheet = inputs.sheets[sheet]; json.column = columns[column]; json.row = row_index; json.cell = cell; outputs.found += 1; var jsonString = JSON.stringify(json); outputs.cells.push(jsonString); } } row_index += 1; } } else { outputs.error = true; outputs.error_message = "Failed to parse Excel file. Parser error: " + parser.getErrorMessage(); } } } catch (ex) { outputs.error = true; outputs.error_message = "Caught an exception. Parser error: " + parser.getErrorMessage(); } } catch (ex) { outputs.error = true; outputs.error_message = "Caught an exception.
